    java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Rectangle> tableRects,
    java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Rectangle> miscRects)
        Pan Creates a pan tool
        Parameters:
        renderer - Used to access mouse position relative to renderer coordinate plane
        tableRects - ArrayList of table rectangles which are moved when panning
        miscRects - ArrayList of drawn rectangles which are moved when panning
